name: 24/7 Rider (Endless Runner)
description:
The most ideal place to do a dash is here, where you cant jump over but you can't drive under

The Jump is marked with blue and the dash is marked with red. Use the dash like this to get past this obstacle.

DOWNLOADING:

You can download the exe but that may act a bit weird so you can also download the source code. (The first file is the source code, the second file is the exe)
